text: Patricia Ann Brake (25 June 1942 â€“ 28 May 2022) was an English actress. Brake played Ingrid Fletcher in the BBC sitcom Porridge, and its sequel Going Straight. In 2015, she guest-starred in the BBC ongoing drama Casualty and in Midsomer Murders for ITV. Brake died from cancer on 28 May 2022, at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Somerset Category:People from Bath, Somerset Category:Cancer deaths in the United Kingdom
title: Patricia Brake
